tasks.title: Define MCP Schema and Base Entities
tasks.description: Create the initial draft of the MCP Schema and define base entities for the project.
tasks.details: Utilize JSON Schema to define the structure of MCP orders, context, and results. Ensure the schema is comprehensive and covers all necessary fields for input and output. Collaborate with stakeholders to finalize the schema.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate the schema using JSON Schema validators. Ensure all required fields are present and correctly typed. Conduct peer reviews to ensure completeness and accuracy.

tasks.title: Prototype MCP Server with FastAPI
tasks.description: Develop a prototype of the MCP server using FastAPI and Pydantic for schema validation.
tasks.details: Set up a FastAPI project with a recommended folder structure. Implement endpoints to handle MCP orders, including a POST /mcp/order for receiving orders and a GET /health for basic health checks. Use Pydantic models for MCPOrder and MCPResult, and validate orders using both Pydantic and JSON Schema for robustness. Simulate order execution by logging actions. Document each endpoint and model, including request/response examples.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for the POST /mcp/order endpoint, covering both valid and invalid cases. Use mock data to simulate various order scenarios and validate responses. Ensure that the health check endpoint functions correctly.

subtasks.title: Set up FastAPI project structure
subtasks.description: Create the recommended folder structure for the FastAPI project, including directories for API endpoints, models, schemas, and core validation logic.

subtasks.title: Implement POST /mcp/order endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop the POST /mcp/order endpoint to receive and validate MCP orders using Pydantic and JSON Schema.

subtasks.title: Implement GET /health endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop a basic health check endpoint to ensure the server is running correctly.

subtasks.title: Write unit tests for endpoints
subtasks.description: Create unit tests for the POST /mcp/order and GET /health endpoints, ensuring correct processing and response handling.

subtasks.title: Document endpoints and models
subtasks.description: Document each endpoint and model, including examples of requests and responses in the docstrings or README.

tasks.title: Validate MCP Schema with Prototype
tasks.description: Integrate the MCP schema into the server prototype and validate its functionality.
tasks.details: Incorporate the MCP schema into the FastAPI server and ensure that incoming orders are validated against the schema. Handle validation errors gracefully and provide meaningful feedback.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform integration tests to ensure that the schema validation works as expected. Test with both valid and invalid data to confirm error handling.

tasks.title: Develop Home Assistant Integration Module
tasks.description: Create a module to integrate the MCP server with Home Assistant using REST API.
tasks.details: Implement a REST API client within the MCP server to communicate with Home Assistant. Ensure secure token-based authentication and handle API responses appropriately.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct end-to-end tests to verify communication between the MCP server and Home Assistant. Use test tokens and mock Home Assistant instances to validate integration.

tasks.title: Implement LLM Prompt Module
tasks.description: Develop a module for generating and handling prompts for the LLM.
tasks.details: Design a system for creating prompts based on MCP orders and processing responses from the LLM. Ensure compatibility with existing MCP server architecture.
tasks.testStrategy: Test prompt generation and response handling with a variety of MCP orders. Validate that the prompts are correctly formatted and responses are accurately processed.

tasks.title: Conduct End-to-End Testing
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive end-to-end testing of the entire system from order reception to LLM response.
tasks.details: Set up test scenarios that cover the full lifecycle of an MCP order, including integration with Home Assistant and LLM. Ensure all components work seamlessly together.
tasks.testStrategy: Use automated testing tools to simulate real-world scenarios and validate system performance. Include edge cases and stress testing to ensure robustness.

tasks.title: Enhance Security Measures
tasks.description: Implement security enhancements for the MCP server and integration modules.
tasks.details: Review the current security posture and identify potential vulnerabilities. Implement measures such as input validation, rate limiting, and secure token management.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct security audits and penetration testing to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities. Use tools like OWASP ZAP to automate security testing.

tasks.title: Improve User Experience
tasks.description: Enhance the user experience of the MCP server and integration modules.
tasks.details: Gather user feedback and identify areas for improvement in the user interface and interaction flow. Implement changes to improve usability and accessibility.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing sessions to gather feedback on the new interface. Use A/B testing to compare changes and measure improvements.

tasks.title: Modularize Codebase for Extensibility
tasks.description: Refactor the codebase to improve modularity and facilitate future extensions.
tasks.details: Identify tightly coupled components and refactor them into separate modules. Ensure clear interfaces and documentation for each module to support future development.
tasks.testStrategy: Review the codebase to ensure modularity and adherence to design principles. Conduct code reviews to ensure maintainability and extensibility.

tasks.title: Prepare Deployment Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up the deployment infrastructure for the MCP server in a Python environment.
tasks.details: Configure deployment scripts and environment settings to support deployment in various Python environments. Ensure compatibility with Home Assistant requirements.
tasks.testStrategy: Test deployment scripts in different environments to ensure smooth deployment. Validate that all dependencies are correctly installed and configured.
